en_US.name: Dried Fruit - Plums
en_US.description: Our own delicious Babylonstoren plums have been dried, preserving their sweet taste for a convenient snack. Pop them into your lunchbox for an energy-boosting bite throughout the day.
en_US.shortDescription: A convenient snack 100 g

en_US.name: Beetroot Achar - Medium
en_US.description:
Only hand harvested beetroots are used for this achar. Finely prepared curry spices and sugar are added at just the right temperature to bring out the best flavours in this brightly coloured delight. Enjoy with cold cuts, meat cooked on the coals or waterblommetjiebredie. This achar also works as a salad when covered with red onion rings and feta. 

To enjoy seasonal treats all year round, we've bottled up a variety of fruits and veg - some oozing with sweet syrup, others pickled to perfection. We tried to do something different with this achar, so we use beetroot as the main ingredient. Store in the larder to enjoy with cheese, bread and fresh garden harvests. Also gifts up nicely as a delicious present for the host!

Chef Tip: This savoury achar pairs well with steak or lamb cutlets cooked on the fire.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy with waterblommetjiebredie or meat

en_US.name: US - Shipping Tags
en_US.description: Tags that will be used to determine shipping charges and to who payment will be sent to.

en_US.name: Farm Products
en_US.description: Normal Farm Products being sold in the US

en_US.name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil - Blend
en_US.description: A blend of 5 Italian varieties grown in the sun and soil on the slopes of the Simonsberg. The smell varies from green and leafy to fruity as five varieties of olives are used in Babylonstoren's oil. Take a sip and feel the silkiness on the tongue and in the throat. You will taste fruity, herb, peppery notes and soft, subtle florals. Pure golden goodness!
en_US.shortDescription: Cold Pressed from hand harvested olives 500 ml

en_US.name: US - Shipping Tags
en_US.description: Tags that will be used to determine shipping charges and to who payment will be sent to.

en_US.name: Bitterlekker
en_US.description: US Bitterlekker has its own shipping cost

en_US.name: Bitterlekker
en_US.description:
The name 'bitterlekker' perfectly summarises this non-alcoholic aperitif – a sophisticated drink with a slightly bitter taste that wakes the palate. And on a balmy day, it's thirst-quenching and just plain delicious – lekker!

Expect a bittersweet symphony of herbal notes and zesty citrus, including blood orange, grapefruit and the lingering bitterness of orange peel.  Also included in the mix is Babylonstoren honeybush tea, giving bitterlekker a lovely, dry finish. The complex taste was perfected after testing no fewer than 27 recipes – the final product contains 17 ingredients, of which one is a well-guarded secret.
en_US.shortDescription: A bittersweet symphony of herbal notes 6 x 100 ml

en_US.name: US - Shipping Tags
en_US.description: Tags that will be used to determine shipping charges and to who payment will be sent to.

en_US.name: Farm Products
en_US.description: Normal Farm Products being sold in the US

en_US.name: Honeybush Tea
en_US.description:
Made from the indigenous Honeybush plant that forms part of the fynbos biome, our honeybush tea is infused with the essence of the Southern Cape. Enjoyed for its herbal-flowery taste, slight sweetness and honey aroma, this tea is a delightful alternative to the everyday cuppa. It is 100% natural, low in tannin and contains no caffeine or sugar. 

The relaxing and soothing qualities of honeybush tea make it the ideal beverage to complement a healthy lifestyle. To get the great taste of honeybush tea, brew with fresh boiled water to the preferred strength and enjoy hot or cold.
en_US.shortDescription: Organic herbal tea with honey aroma

en_US.name: Medium Somerset Cyder - 6 pack
en_US.description: Made by The Newt in Somerset, we stock some of Britain's best cyder. Made from a blend of locally grown Somerset Bittersweet cyder apples, the Medium Somerset Cyder from The Newt in Somerset's “Newt Blended Range” is a natural mix of crisp taste, full-bodied tannins and sweetness. The apple juice is cold-fermented to retain maximum flavour and bring you an apple-forward medium cyder.
en_US.shortDescription: Blended cyder from Somerset Bittersweet cyder apples

en_US.name: Blood Orange Mampoer
en_US.description:
The Afrikaans word mampoer is derived from the name of an old Pedi chief, Mampuru, and refers to very strong, clear spirits made from fermented fruit. The making of mampoer is an almost sacred Afrikaner ancestral practice. And what wine and wine-making is to the inhabitants of the  Cape, mampoer and distillation is to those who live up North.

Chef Tip: Serve with plenty of ice as a refreshing aperitif or a fiery drop neat as a digestif.
en_US.shortDescription: Refreshing aperitif or a fiery drop neat as a digestif

en_US.name: US - Shipping Tags
en_US.description: Tags that will be used to determine shipping charges and to who payment will be sent to.

en_US.name: Farm Products
en_US.description: Normal Farm Products being sold in the US

en_US.name: Babylonstoren Balsamic Vinegar - 3-year-old
en_US.description:
Our 3-year-old balsamic vinegar started as must from vines lovingly tended in Italy and bottled at Babylonstoren. Aged in oak barrels for a minimum of three years in the traditional style of Aceto Balsamico Tradizionale di Modena. Complex and nuanced, this vinegar is rich in colour, with a delicate balance of sweet and sour. 

Pro tip: drizzle generously as a finishing touch over sweet or savoury plates - anything from salad to cheese to ripe, plump berries.
en_US.shortDescription: Aged 3 years in traditional Italian style 375 ml

en_US.name: Sparkling Grape Juice
en_US.description:
This lively, sparkling white grape juice is made from luscious sémillon grapes, picked in late summer here on the farm, when they are at their sweetest. Extremely quaffable, especially on a hot summer's day. An elegant non-alcoholic option. Serve ice cold.

750 ml
en_US.shortDescription: Made from sémillon grapes 750 ml

en_US.name: Beetroot & Garlic Salt Flakes
en_US.description: Our beetroot and garlic salt flakes add extra flavour and flair to any simple dish. The beetroot stains the salt a beautiful pink colour and gives it a delicate, earthy flavour, while the garlic gives the mixture some punch. Keep in the spice drawer or present as unique gift to a host.
en_US.shortDescription: Add extra flavour and flair to any simple dish 65 g

en_US.name: Citron Marmalade - Small
en_US.description:
Citron is a large, rather old fashioned citrus fruit with a thick rind. The peculiar looking fruit is not ideal for eating fresh, but makes delectable marmalade. This meaty marmalade is sure to become a favourite at the breakfast table.

Chef Tip: Serve with roosterkoek, fresh bread or scones.
en_US.shortDescription: Delectable marmalade, a breakfast table favourite

en_US.name: Babylonstoren Balsamic Vinegar - 12-year-old
en_US.description:
Balsamic vinegar produced in the traditional Italian style, the way it’s made in Modena and Emilia. The sweet grape juice is cooked to concentrate the sugar. It’s then given lots of time in wooden barrels of successively smaller sizes and matured for at least 12 years to turn into balsamic vinegar.  

Chef Tip: Drip over parmesan, prosciutto, ice-cream or serve a few drops as an after-dinner palate cleanser.
en_US.shortDescription: Aged 12 years in traditional Italian style 100 ml

en_US.name: Babylonstoren Nougat
en_US.description: We’ve concocted a special treat that brings to mind the pink almond blossoms and clusters of macadamia blooms during spring on the farm. Our pillow-soft nougat is handmade in two delicate flavours: macadamia, rosewater + honey and almond, thyme + honey. These sweet treats are a feast for both the eyes and your taste buds. Their soft pink and green hues disguise an exquisite balance between nutty crunch and gentle sweetness.
en_US.shortDescription: Pillow-soft nougat in two delicate flavours 2 x 50 g

en_US.name: White Chocolate with Almonds
en_US.description:
Fine, handcrafted Belgian white chocolate that is creamy and decadent, with a high cocoa butter content. We also incorporate our own crushed and raw almonds in these chocolates - our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. The other cross-pollinators we grow are Peerless and Ferragnes. All our nuts are picked by hand, right here on the farm.

*Each slab weighs 90g
en_US.shortDescription: Premium Babylonstoren white chocolate 75 g

en_US.name: Milk Chocolate With Sourdough
en_US.description: Babylonstoren’s artisanal sourdough breadcrumbs are folded into smooth, creamy Belgian chocolate to create our handcrafted chocolate slabs. The crumbs are carefully dried and crushed to the perfect size and dryness, and seasoned with a dash of salt to offset the sweetness of the chocolate.
en_US.shortDescription: Sourdough crumbs in milk chocolate 75 g

en_US.name: Mixed Somerset Cyder - 6 pack
en_US.description: The Newt’s cyders are made with 100% apple juice, using slow cold fermentation to release the residual sweetness of this humble fruit. The Somerset Cyders are blended at the apple juice stage of the cyder making process. The Blended Range consists of a variety of classic Somerset apples such as Dabinett, Yarlington Mill, Harry Masters Jersey, Browns and Chisel Jersey from local Somerset orchards to create a well-balanced cyder juice before the art of cold fermentation begins. This selection includes the Dry, Medium and Sweet Somerset Cyders.
en_US.shortDescription: A mixed case of cyder from Somerset, England

en_US.name: Egyptian Dukkah
en_US.description: Our version of the classic North African spice rub is an aromatic blend of peanuts, sunflower seeds, sesame seeds, coriander, cumin and brown sugar. With fresh, crusty bread and a generous glug of our olive oil, it makes a simple pre-dinner bite. Versatile enough to sprinkle over salads and roasted vegetables, to use as a rub for meat or for making a quick bowl of spiced rice.
en_US.shortDescription: Aromatic blend of peanuts, seeds and spices

en_US.name: US - Shipping Tags
en_US.description: Tags that will be used to determine shipping charges and to who payment will be sent to.

en_US.name: Farm Products
en_US.description: Normal Farm Products being sold in the US

en_US.name: Rooibos Tea
en_US.description: Family of South Africa's indigenous fynbos, this tea has a herbal and fruity taste and distinctive red colour. Made from the dried leaves rooibos is not only naturally sugar and caffeine free, but it's also appreciated for its great flavour and health benefits.
en_US.shortDescription: Organic tea with herbal and fruity taste

en_US.name: Milk Chocolate with Nuts
en_US.description:
Fine, handcrafted Belgian milk chocolate with a smooth and silky texture. Our chocolatiers use a selection of our own roasted and salted nuts in these chocolates - our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. The other cross-pollinators we grow are Peerless and Ferragnes. We also grow the pecan and macadamia nuts right here on the farm and pick them all by hand.

*Each slab weighs 90g
en_US.shortDescription: Premium Babylonstoren milk chocolate 75 g

en_US.name: Macadamia & Carob Granola
en_US.description: A favourite on the Babylonstoren breakfast table, our Macadamia and Carob granola is the perfect way to take our farm hospitality home with you! Eat with milk for breakfast, serve with ice cream as a snack or sprinkle over freshly-baked cake as a garnish!
en_US.shortDescription: A Babylonstoren breakfast favourite 250 g

en_US.name: Bluegum Honey - Small
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. Delicious drizzled over brie, ripe figs or freshly baked bread. Also enjoy our honey as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods.
en_US.shortDescription: Raw and unfiltered 175 g

en_US.name: Babylonstoren Still Water - 6 Pack
en_US.description: Stay cool and hydrated with Babylonstoren’s water. Our water is sourced from our own aquifer and bottled right here on the farm. It comes in a stylish blue bottle and is delightfully refreshing.
en_US.shortDescription: Sourced and bottled on the farm 6 x 500 ml

en_US.name: US - Shipping Tags
en_US.description: Tags that will be used to determine shipping charges and to who payment will be sent to.

en_US.name: Farm Products
en_US.description: Normal Farm Products being sold in the US

en_US.name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil - Frantoio
en_US.description: Extracted from a single varietal, pure Frantoio essence has been trapped within this golden delicious olive oil. Savour layers of creaminess, notes of green grass, almonds, wildflowers and green apple. Best enjoy drizzled over seasonal salads or soaked up by chunks of fresh bread.
en_US.shortDescription: Single varietal extra virgin olive oil 500 ml

en_US.name: Kalamata Olives
en_US.description: Our olives are grown here on the farm, at the foot of the Simonsberg mountain. Delicious on its own, enjoyed in salads, on bread and in savoury or even sweet dishes.
en_US.shortDescription: Natural olives

en_US.name: Dried Fruit - Black Fig
en_US.description: Our own delicious Babylonstoren figs have been dried, preserving that fragrant taste for a convenient snack. Pop them into your lunchbox for an energy-boosting bite throughout the day
en_US.shortDescription: A convenient snack 150 g

en_US.name: Coarse Brown Flour
en_US.description: Babylonstoren’s bakers use only the highest quality flour to bake our breads and pastries. This stoneground wholewheat flour is unbleached and milled for us by Golden Reef Milling. It contains the whole wheat kernel and has a high fibre content, resulting in a flavourful and healthy bread. It is free from GMO's and preservatives and has excellent rising quality.
en_US.shortDescription: Unbleached, natural flour 1 kg

en_US.name: Buffalo Amasi & Seeded Bran Rusks
en_US.description:
Two local teatime favourites, packed in our iconic large Delft tin. Made with stoneground flour and free-range eggs, both recipes are made with real ingredients, the way your grandmother would. We've added our own twist to the much-loved South African buttermilk rusk by using Babylonstoren water buffalo amasi for a creamy, moreish dipper. The seeded rusks contain a mix of seeds for a perfectly crunchy teatime treat.

200 g & 400 g
en_US.shortDescription: Water buffalo amasi rusks 200 g & seeded bran rusks 400 g

en_US.name: Kalamata Olives with Herbs
en_US.description: Our olives are grown here on the farm, at the foot of the Simonsberg mountain. Our chefs paired this delicious black olive with the classic aromatics, rosemary and bay leave. Delicious on its own, enjoyed in salads, on bread and in savoury or even sweet dishes.
en_US.shortDescription: Preserved with rosemary and bayleaf

en_US.name: Chocolate Nut & Ginger Biscotti
en_US.description:
Handmade with the best ingredients - farm butter, Callebaut Couverture chocolate with a high cocoa butter content, roasted nuts and candied ginger. Be warned - they are incredibly moreish. We won't blame you if you don't want to share...

180g
en_US.shortDescription: Artisan made with care and perfection

en_US.name: Olive & Lemon Paste
en_US.description: Made with our farm-grown Eureka lemons, this Olive and Lemon Paste is created by boiling the whole lemons until they're broken down entirely. We then add our own mission olives to create a smooth, savoury paste. This versatile pantry staple works wonderfully with tomato-based curries, as well as fish, charcuterie and strong cheese.
en_US.shortDescription: Versatile & vibrant  125 g

en_US.name: Savoury Granola
en_US.description: A favourite on the Babylonstoren breakfast table, our savoury granola is the perfect way to take our farm hospitality home with you! Eat with milk for breakfast, serve with ice cream as a snack or sprinkle over a freshly-baked cake as a garnish!
en_US.shortDescription: A Babylonstoren breakfast favourite 250 g

en_US.name: Wildflower Honey - Medium
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. The golden nectar, produced by local bees, is known for its healing properties and sweet taste. Delicious drizzled over brie, ripe figs or freshly baked bread. Also enjoy our honey as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods.
en_US.shortDescription: Raw and unfiltered 450 g

en_US.name: Babylonstoren Sparkling Water - 6 Pack
en_US.description: Stay cool and hydrated with Babylonstoren’s water. Our water is sourced from our own aquifer and bottled right here on the farm. Infused with bubbles to make it delightfully soft and refreshing.
en_US.shortDescription: Sourced and bottled on the farm 6 x 500 ml

en_US.name: Dried Fruit - Naartjies
en_US.description: This much-loved local fruit has been dried, preserving that citrusy sweetness for a convenient snack. All of the flavour of naartjies, none of the juicy mess!
en_US.shortDescription: A convenient snack 150 g

en_US.name: Dry Somerset Cyder - 6 pack
en_US.description: The Newt’s Somerset Cyders are blended at the apple juice stage of the cyder making process. The Blended Range consists of a variety of classic Somerset apples such as Dabinett, Yarlington Mill, Harry Masters Jersey, Browns and Chisel Jersey from local Somerset orchards to create a well-balanced cyder juice before the art of cold fermentation begins. This dry cyder offers a pleasant bitterness, with a touch of sweetness. Golden hued with an aroma of ripe gooseberry, honey and lychees, this is a wonderfully well-balanced cyder with lovely tartness as a result of an 8 week fermentation. The cyder’s attractive dryness cuts through fatty dishes excellently – try with Babylonstoren Saucisson Sec or pork belly.
en_US.shortDescription: Single variety, deep, dry balanced cyder

en_US.name: Vegan Almond Bran Rusks
en_US.description:
A vegan take on the classic South African teatime treat, packed in our iconic small Delft tin. These delicious rusks are made with almond bran, rolled oats and almond and coconut milk.
200 g
en_US.shortDescription: Freshly baked rusks 200 g

en_US.name: Raw Pecan Nuts In Honey
en_US.description:
Our raw pecan nuts are hand-picked right here on the farm. The main cultivar, Wichita, produces the largest yield and best quality pecans. We also grow Navaho pecan nuts as a crosspollinator. The raw nuts are preserved in Babylonstoren honey.

Drizzle over your Christmas panettone or eat with our home made yoghurt & granola.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy with cheese, breads or desserts 185 g

en_US.name: Pear Chutney - Medium
en_US.description: An old favourite, this chutney has stood the test of time. Our chef's unique blend of spices, pears, sultanas, onions and the finest cider vinegar makes this chutney the perfect accompaniment for charcuterie, cheese, bobotie or grilled meats.
en_US.shortDescription: Perfect for bobotie & grilled meat

en_US.name: Dark Chocolate with Almonds - Sugar-free
en_US.description:
Fine, handcrafted Belgian dark chocolate, made from the finest Belgian couverture, with a cocoa content of 60% that is rich and intense. This chocolate is sugar-free and uses a natural sweetener, maltitol, which reduces calories and ensures the sweetness remains without compromising the luxurious quality. We also incorporate our own crushed and raw almonds in these chocolates - our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. The other cross-pollinators we grow are Peerless and Ferragnes.

*Each slab weighs 90g
en_US.shortDescription: Premium sugar-free Babylonstoren dark chocolate 75 g

en_US.name: Rooibos Tea - Loose Leaf
en_US.description: Family of South Africa's indigenous fynbos, this tea has a herbal and fruity taste and distinctive red colour. Made from the dried leaves rooibos is not only naturally sugar and caffeine free, but it's also appreciated for its great flavour and health benefits.
en_US.shortDescription: Organic loose leave tea - caffeine free

en_US.name: Wildflower Honey - Small
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. Delicious drizzled over brie, ripe figs or freshly baked bread. Also enjoy our honey as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods.
en_US.shortDescription: Raw and unfiltered 175 g

en_US.name: Quince & Rooibos Jelly - Small
en_US.description: To enjoy seasonal treats all year round, we've bottled up a variety of fruits and veg. For this jelly, our chefs have paired quince fruit with rooibos. We recently started growing our own rooibos on the farm and will start incorporating it into this jelly soon. Store in the larder to enjoy with cheese, bread and fresh garden harvests. Also gifts up nicely as a delicious present for the host!
en_US.shortDescription: A staple for your larder, enjoy with cheese

en_US.name: Sweet Somerset Cyder - 6 Pack
en_US.description: The Newt’s Somerset Cyders are blended at the apple juice stage of the cyder making process. The Blended Range consists of a variety of classic Somerset apples such as Dabinett, Yarlington Mill, Harry Masters Jersey, Browns and Chisel Jersey from local Somerset orchards to create a well-balanced cyder juice before the art of cold fermentation begins. A great introduction to cyder, this sweet cyder has a bright taste with full and fruity flavours. Golden coloured, with notes of light toffee and nuts, the cyder is allowed to ferment over 4 weeks to create a fragrant and floral aroma. Its intrinsic sweetness is balanced by its acidity on the palate, finishing with a dry, persistent mouthfeel. A great pairing with apple-inspired desserts.
en_US.shortDescription: Single variety, deep, sweet balanced cyder

en_US.name: Quince Chutney - Medium
en_US.description: Perfectly ripened seasonal quinces are diced and cooked in a white wine and vinegar reduction together with nutmeg, salt & pepper to bring you this fruity, slightly sweet sensation. This chutney works really well with curries, venison dishes or as a condiment with your favourite cheese.
en_US.shortDescription: Perfect for curries, grilled meats or cheese

en_US.name: Red Plum & Lemon Verbena Cordial
en_US.description: Babylonstoren plums are sweet and juicy, making them the perfect choice for our summer-inspired cordial. For this cordial, the plum flavour is married with fresh lemon-scented verbena, turning it into a symphony that can be enjoyed all year round. Add sparkling water for a refreshing drink, use as a dessert topping or mix in with your favourite cocktail.
en_US.shortDescription: A taste of summer, all year round 500 ml

en_US.name: Dark Chocolate with Almonds
en_US.description:
Fine, handcrafted Belgian dark chocolate, made from the finest Belgian couverture, with a cocoa content of 60% that is rich and intense. We also use our own whole and salted almonds in these chocolates - our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. The other cross-pollinators we grow are Peerless and Ferragnes.

*Each slab weighs 90g
en_US.shortDescription: Premium Babylonstoren dark chocolate 75 g

en_US.name: Delft Tin with Macadamia Nuts
en_US.description:
The spring flowers of the macadamia tree are pollinated by bees and it takes a weight of at least 136kg to break a macadamia shell. Our macadamia cultivar, Proteaceae, produces the best quality macadamia nuts. Grown, picked and roasted right here on the farm, these macadamias are bursting with flavour!

This makes the perfect gift, Macadamia nuts in a beautiful Delft tin !
en_US.shortDescription: Perfect for a nutty moment 200 g

en_US.name: Dried Fruit - Persimmons
en_US.description: Grown right here on the farm, these golden fruits have been dried, preserving that honey-flavoured sweetness for a convenient snack. All of the flavour of persimmons, none of the juicy mess!
en_US.shortDescription: A convenient snack 100 g

en_US.name: Nocellara Olives
en_US.description: Our olives are grown here on the farm, at the foot of the Simonsberg mountain. Delicious on its own, enjoyed in salads, on bread and in savoury or even sweet dishes.
en_US.shortDescription: Natural olives

en_US.name: Raw Pecan Nuts - Small
en_US.description: Our raw pecan nuts are hand-picked right here on the farm. The main cultivar, Wichita, produces the largest yield and best quality pecans. We also grow Navaho pecan nuts as a crosspollinator.
en_US.shortDescription: Pecan nuts from our farm 150 g

en_US.name: Dark Chocolate With Rye
en_US.description: The finest selected dark Belgian chocolate, handcrafted into special slabs. These small-batch chocolates contain crispy crumbs from Babylonstoren’s artisanal rye bread – carefully dried and seasoned with a dash of salt. The combination of exceptional tastes and textures creates a special kind of magic!
en_US.shortDescription: Rye crumbs dark chocolate treat 75 g

en_US.name: Celery & Fennel Preserve - Small
en_US.description:
To enjoy seasonal treats all year round, we've bottled up a variety of fruits and veg. This preserve is made with fresh celery and fennel! Store in the larder to enjoy with cheese, bread, and fresh garden harvests. Also gifts up nicely as a delicious present for the host!

Chef Tip: Mix into a fresh garden salad or serve with charcuterie, cheese or a pork belly roast.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy with cheese, bread and fresh garden harvests 180 g

en_US.name: Apricot & Lemon Thyme Preserve - Small
en_US.description: Apricots and lemon thyme have been paired perfectly to bring you a magnificent twist on an age-old favourite. This preserve is excellent on toast with cheese. It also works really well when lightly spread on a snoek that is being cooked on the coals.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy with cheese, bread and fresh garden harvests

en_US.name: Seville & Kumquat Jelly
en_US.description: Seville oranges and kumquats both originate from southeast Asia. Neither of them are ideally eaten fresh, but our chefs have turned them into a symphony of flavours. The bittersweet taste is perfect for warm toast and also works particularly well as a basting for oven roasted chicken.
en_US.shortDescription: A delectable marmalade with fruit from southeast Asia

en_US.name: Fynbos Honey - Small
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. Delicious drizzled over brie, ripe figs or freshly baked bread. Also, enjoy our honey as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods.
en_US.shortDescription: Raw and unfiltered 175 g

en_US.name: Raw Macadamias - Small
en_US.description: The spring flowers of the macadamia tree are pollinated by bees and it takes a weight of at least 136kg to break a macadamia shell. Our macadamia cultivar, Proteaceae, produces the best quality macadamia nuts. Grown and picked right here on the farm, these macadamias are bursting with flavour!
en_US.shortDescription: Picked right here on the farm 150 g

en_US.name: Raw Almonds - Small
en_US.description: Our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. Grown and picked right here on the farm, these almonds are bursting with flavour!
en_US.shortDescription: Picked right here on the farm 150 g

en_US.name: Fynbos Honey - Medium
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. Delicious drizzled over brie, ripe figs or freshly baked bread. Also, enjoy our honey as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods.
en_US.shortDescription: Raw and unfiltered 450 g

en_US.name: Roasted & Salted Almonds - Small
en_US.description: Our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. Grown, picked, roasted and salted right here on the farm, these almonds are bursting with flavour!
en_US.shortDescription: Picked, roasted and salted on the farm 150 g

en_US.name: Seville & Kumquat Marmalade - Small
en_US.description: Seville oranges and kumquats both originate from southeast Asia. Neither of them are ideally eaten fresh, but our chefs have turned them into a symphony of flavours. The bittersweet taste is perfect for warm toast and also works particularly well as a basting for oven roasted chicken.
en_US.shortDescription: A delectable marmalade with fruit from southeast Asia

en_US.name: Macadamia Blossom Honey - Medium
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. Produced by local bees in the macadamia orchards in our valley, the golden nectar is known for its healing properties and sweet taste. Delicious drizzled over brie, ripe figs or freshly baked bread. Also enjoy our honey as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods.
en_US.shortDescription: Raw and unfiltered 450 g

en_US.name: Green Prickly Pear & Mint Cordial
en_US.description: Our farm’s bountiful late-summer produce includes a Babylonstoren favourite: prickly pears in all colours. What better way to enjoy their delicious flavour all year round, than to bottle them up to make a delectable cordial? For this cordial, green prickly pears have been combined with invigorating mint, creating a delightful taste sensation. Add sparkling water for a refreshing drink, use as a dessert topping or mix in with your favourite cocktail.
en_US.shortDescription: Add sparkling water for a refreshing drink 500 ml

en_US.name: Creamed Fynbos Honey - Medium
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. Creamed honey has been crystallized in a honey creamer in order to control the size of the crystals that naturally form in honey. The result is a smooth, sumptuous texture that is perfect as a spread while preserving the goodness of raw honey. Delicious enjoyed as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods, the thick honey makes it ideal for spreading on toast, pastries or cake.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoyed as a natural sweetener

en_US.name: Bergamot Jelly
en_US.description: Bergamots, also called sour oranges, are known for the exotic perfume exuded by the oils in its skin. Combined with its deliciously puckery juice, they make the perfect marmalade. Enjoy a spoonful on your morning toast with salted butter.
en_US.shortDescription: Also called sour oranges

en_US.name: Salted Caramel - Medium
en_US.description: Having a pantry stocked with delectable goodies makes entertaining friends and family a breeze. Our salted caramel adds another option to the dessert table, so let your creativity run wild and pair with doughnuts, pancakes, ice cream or cookies!
en_US.shortDescription: Perfect for the sweet tooth

en_US.name: Rose Petal, Beetroot, Ginger & Fennel Salt
en_US.description:
Contains only the highest quality rose petals, specifically selected for their superior taste. These delicate petals are prepared and dehydrated in very small batches and combined with the complementary flavours of beetroot, ginger and fennel. 
This salt works particularly well with salmon and trout, prawns and poultry, or any other protein that can benefit from delicately flavoured seasoning.

65 g
en_US.shortDescription: Delicately flavoured seasoning 65 g

en_US.name: Roasted & Salted Macadamias - Small
en_US.description: The spring flowers of the macadamia tree are pollinated by bees and it takes a weight of at least 136kg to break a macadamia shell. Our macadamia cultivar, Proteaceae, produces the best quality macadamia nuts. Grown, picked, roasted and salted right here on the farm, these macadamias are bursting with flavour!
en_US.shortDescription: Picked and roasted on the farm 150 g

en_US.name: Citron Preserve - Medium
en_US.description:
To enjoy seasonal treats all year round, we've bottled up a variety of fruits and veg - some oozing with sweet syrup, others pickled to perfection. Store in the larder to enjoy with cheese, bread and fresh garden harvests. Also gifts up nicely as a delicious present for the host!

Chef Tip: Slice into thin pieces and serve with breakfast granola and homemade yogurt.
en_US.shortDescription: A staple for your larder, enjoy with cheese

en_US.name: Roasted Macadamias - Small
en_US.description: The spring flowers of the macadamia tree are pollinated by bees and it takes a weight of at least 136kg to break a macadamia shell. Our macadamia cultivar, Proteaceae, produces the best quality macadamia nuts. Grown, picked and roasted right here on the farm, these macadamias are bursting with flavour!
en_US.shortDescription: Picked and roasted on the farm 150 g

en_US.name: Shiraz Preserve - Small
en_US.description: Made from our flagship grape cultivar, our shiraz preserve is no ordinary jam. In summer our winemakers keep some of the small bunches of black shiraz grapes for our chefs to make a sweet, dark preserve. Delicious on hot toast with lashings of butter, as a pancake topping, mixed into a cheesecake or concocted into a flavoured butter to go with a steak.
en_US.shortDescription: A sweet dark preserve made from Shiraz grapes 180 g

en_US.name: Kalmoesfontein Capers
en_US.description:
Capers are the unripened flower buds of the caper bush. Freshly picked caper berries from Kalmoesfontein farm on the slopes of the Paardeberg are preserved by soaking in a saline solution, before being dried and packed with salt to preserve. 

These are gorgeous capers to use with most Pasta and fish dishes.

95g
en_US.shortDescription: Delicious, salty taste 95 g

en_US.name: Olive & Shiraz Grape Rub - Small
en_US.description: Inspired by the seasonal flavours of the farm, this rub is made using flavoursome farm ingredients. During the annual vineyard harvest, we make the most of every berry – the grapes are pressed and fermented into juice, leaving behind the flavourful skins. For this unique rub, Shiraz grape skin from our own vineyards has been combined with delicious Kalamata olives for a unique to add unique flavour to your choice of beef.
en_US.shortDescription: Inspired by the seasonal flavours of the farm

en_US.name: Roasted Almonds - Small
en_US.description: Our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. Grown, picked and roasted right here on the farm, these almonds are bursting with flavour!
en_US.shortDescription: Picked and roasted on the farm 150 g

en_US.name: Blue Gum Honey - Large
en_US.description: Thanks to our varied plant life and hardworking bees we get to harvest one of nature's sweetest gifts. The golden nectar, produced by local bees, is known for its healing properties and sweet taste. Delicious drizzled over brie, ripe figs or freshly baked bread. Also enjoy our honey as a natural sweetener in tea or baked goods.
en_US.shortDescription: Raw and unfiltered 600 ml

en_US.name: Spiced Red Prickly Pear Cordial
en_US.description: Prickly pears may be pesky to harvest, but they're oh so delicious once you get to their sweet and juicy inner core. This much-loved South African treat is made from one of the most interesting and delicious summer fruits from Babylonstoren farm. It's as good-looking as it is tasty! Pour it over our Babylonstoren water buffalo gelato, or mix it to create your favourite cocktail or mocktail.
en_US.shortDescription: A bright red South African favourite 500 ml

en_US.name: Roasted Almonds In Honey - Small
en_US.description:
Our main almond cultivar, Nonpareil, produces the largest yield and best quality almonds. Grown, picked and roasted right here on the farm, only the best quality nuts are placed in jars filled with raw honey.

Drizzle over your Christmas panettone or eat with our home made yoghurt & granola.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy with cheese, breads or desserts 185 g

en_US.name: Flower, Apple & Citrus Salt
en_US.description: A fragrant addition to your pantry, this floral apple herb salt is infused with buchu leaves, orange, dried red apple pieces and hibiscus flowers. Additional spicy notes include rose, mint, moringa leaves, dill and chamomile, creating a complex seasoning to be used in a variety of creative ways. Add a pinch to your favourite cocktail or sprinkle it over Babylonstoren's creamy buffalo yoghurt cheese for a summery addition to your cheeseboard.
en_US.shortDescription: Summer seasoning 30 g

en_US.name: Koffiekoekies
en_US.description: Freshly baked with the finest ingredients, these much-loved biscuits are a staple on South African tea time tables! Perfect with tea, and even better with coffee, these tasty treats hit the spot every time!
en_US.shortDescription: Artisan made with care and perfection 200 g

en_US.name: Almond & Spelt Rusks
en_US.description: These freshly-baked farm rusks are made with almonds and spelt. The perfect comfort snack for cold, slow mornings, you can enjoy these rusks with coffee, tea or even on their own.
en_US.shortDescription: Freshly-baked 400 g

en_US.name: Quince & Star Anise Preserve - Medium
en_US.description: Spoil yourself with this delicacy. Our farmers pick only the best fruits from our small quince orchard when they have reached the perfect level of ripeness. This traditional Middle-Eastern fruit is sliced and cooked in an aniseed flavoured syrup. This preserve complements our own handmade full cream yoghurt really well when served with a dash of our dukkah.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy with full cream yoghurt & dukkah

en_US.name: Shiraz & Honey Paste
en_US.description: To enjoy seasonal treats all year round, we've bottled up a variety of fruits and veg. Store in the larder to enjoy with cheese, bread and fresh garden harvests. Also gifts up nicely as a delicious present for the host!
en_US.shortDescription: A sweet and tangy delight

en_US.name: Seed Bites
en_US.description: It's time to discover a delectable tea time treat. These seed bites are made with the finest quality ingredients to ensure a satisfying on-the-go snack.
en_US.shortDescription: Delicious and gift-ready seed bites 200 g

en_US.name: Purple Fig with Star Anise - Small
en_US.description: The perfect complement to any cheese platter, and especially good with our buffalo cheese or handmade soft cheese. Only tree ripened fruit are used, resulting in a burst of flavour that may transport you to Morocco. Add a pinch of our dukkah and transform a humble snack to something truly special.
en_US.shortDescription: Tree-ripened on the farm

en_US.name: Quince Membrillo
en_US.description: Membrillo, also known as fruit cheese, is a sweet, thick jelly made of the pulp of the quince. Our take on this traditional classic is set in a glass jar for easy scooping. Enjoy it with a well-aged dairy cheese with crackers, or with charcuterie and fresh bread.
en_US.shortDescription: Traditional fruit cheese

en_US.name: Eugenia & Orange Blossom Jelly - Small
en_US.description: Our chefs have combined the botanical berry of the Eugenia with aromatic orange blossoms in this unique jelly. Eugenia berries can be either sweet or very tart, depending on their ripeness. Their deep purple flesh gives striking colour to this jelly, while the orange blossom perfectly complements the hint of zing. Enjoy a dollop on toast or a fresh scone, or pair with crispy pork or pink fish like trout.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy a dollop on toast or a fresh scone

en_US.name: Quince & Star Anise Preserve - Large
en_US.description: Spoil yourself with this delicacy. Our farmers pick only the best fruits from our small quince orchard when they have reached the perfect level of ripeness. This traditional Middle-Eastern fruit is sliced and cooked in an aniseed flavoured syrup. This preserve complements our own handmade full cream yoghurt really well when served with a dash of our dukkah.
en_US.shortDescription: Enjoy with full cream yoghurt & dukkah

en_US.name: Pantry Tin
en_US.description:
We’ve gathered together a few essentials for your next party. A beautiful preserve and a moreish chutney, together with perfectly ripe olives make the pantry tin the perfect entertaining gift.  

This hamper will be packaged in our beautiful large biscuit tin.
en_US.shortDescription: Beautiful spoils from our pantry
